about_the_game:
Beyond Enemy Lines - Vietnam is a tactical first person shooter set in the Vietnam War!


You are onboard of a helicopter on the way back to HQ after a top secret mission. Your helicopter gets hit by aan vietnamese RPG and crashes into the vietnamese jungle - you are the only survivor! Your task is to survive and find a way to HQ and deliver your captured informations.

You have total freedom to choose your path - guns blazing or silent assassin - it's your choice! Beyond Enemy Lines - Vietnam is an unforgiving, intense experience where skill and tactical decisions matter!

Features

  • Nonlinear Story Campaign
  • Detailed Weapon Customization
  • Unlock new weapons and weapon attachements for New Game +
  • Variete of controllable vehicles
  • 100% Combat Sandbox, you are free to approach you every mission objective in your way!
  • Different mission areas from jungle to villages and cities
  • Detailed mission rating system
  • From the ground up reengineered AI
  • Unreal Engine 5 and full Lumen Reflection and Global Illumination support
  • And more to be revealed ..

Find out more details and features in the coming months. Make sure to Wishlist Beyond Enemy Lines - Vietnam and Follow us on social media!

content_descriptors.notes: Beyond Enemy Lines - Vietnam contains Blood and Gore in a realistic combat environment.

short_description: Take the role of a U.S. Special Forces soldier crashed into the vietnamese jungle on the return of a top secret mission. Adapt to jungle warfare, make your tactics and survive!

English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Japanese, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Hungarian
